sentences.sContent: Nursing is still one of the most fulfilling careers.
sentences.sCn: 护理仍是最令人有成就感的职业之一。

synos.tran: 令人满意的；能实现个人抱负的；令人高兴的

phrases.pCn: v. 完全实现自己的抱负

remMethod.val: ful(看作full， 充满的) ＋ fill(装满) → 做得圆满 → 履行， 实现

trans.tranCn: 令人满意的；令人愉快的
trans.tranOther: making you feel happy and satisfied because you are doing interesting, useful, or important things
